name: Football Streaker Simulator
description:
WELCOME TO FOOTBALL STREAKER SIMULATOR


You won't find boring player formations, greedy licensed football players, gameplay that remains unchanged for years, or a pile of loot boxes with cards.
Just pure football fun.

JUMP INTO THE FOOTBALL FIELD


REALISTIC SIMULATION OF SIMULATIONS


RUIN THE GAME FOR EVERYBODY, INCLUDING YOURSELF.


RUN IN DIFFERENT HATS!


SCORE GOALS!


SURVIVE THROUGH MADNESS


COMPLETE ALL CHALLENGES




Remember: Streaking isn't just a hobby, it's a way of life!
